name: Journal
description: It will tell you your story - for a price...

name: Sword
description: A reliable blade for battling monsters in dark corridors.

name: Armor
description: Light and flexible armor, offering basic protection.

name: Mage's Staff
description: A staff imbued with elemental magic for powerful spellcasting.

name: Crossbow of Precision
description: A ranged weapon designed for quick, accurate shots in tight dungeon spaces.

name: Fire Arrows
description: Arrows tipped with fire to deal extra damage to enemies.

name: Healing Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health instantly. You never know when it might come in handy.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that makes the wearer invisible.

name: Adventurers Guild
description: You have made enough money adventuring that you decide to buy your own guild... Probably need to defeat a dragon before you buy this.
